name: Forgotten (itch) (SmileHead)
description:
Forgotten - is a walking-simulator with a rich background story. Explore the forbidden forest, hide from creatures, try to find Dana's friends and get out of this doomed place. 

The game is still in development (about 1 year), so we'll push forward, add seven levels more with unique themes and gameplay features. There will be more lore uncovering the story of the forest and Dana's friends fate. In fact, the next level is A burning village. But we need your feedback to make this game much better :)

English and Russian languages

Join us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/smileheadstudio
or Vkontakte: https://vk.com/forgotten_thegam

and YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCq35iq5IRPQpUaR3WQUFdbw
